name: Prepare for Launch
summary: It's time to prepare your spaceship for web3 space travel.
description: It's time to prepare your spaceship for web3 space travel.

requirements.name: Please connect your Metamask wallet by clicking a “Connect Wallet” button on the top of this page.
requirements.description: Please connect your Metamask wallet by clicking a “Connect Wallet” button on the top of this page.

requirements.name: If you are new, no worries, install Metamask if you haven't already and set a wallet as per instruction here.
requirements.description: If you are new, no worries, install Metamask if you haven't already and set a wallet as per instruction here.

name: Fuel for Launch
summary: You are ready to go to far-far places exploring the web3 universe, then let's refuel your rocket.
description: You are ready to go to far-far places exploring the web3 universe, then let's refuel your rocket.

requirements.name: Please join OdysseyDAO discord server, introduce yourself and ask for $FUEL tokens for a game.
requirements.description: Please join OdysseyDAO discord server, introduce yourself and ask for $FUEL tokens for a game.

requirements.name:
You will receive 200 $FUEL tokens and some test MATIC to cover a gas fee. It's enough to play a game.
($FUEL token contact: 0x9D742B0a9F3386A87f8aB62E01B61346Cc29AC26)
requirements.description:

($FUEL token contact: 0x9D742B0a9F3386A87f8aB62E01B61346Cc29AC26)

name: Life Support
summary: You've got a long journey ahead of you, let's bring enough oxygen for you and the crew.
description: You've got a long journey ahead of you, let's bring enough oxygen for you and the crew.

requirements.name:
Go to Uniswap (https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?chain=polygon) and swap 50 $FUEL tokens for some $AIR tokens.
($AIR token contract: 0xf55cb3825335669b5d6ef0d4b16a8202b6c523c3)
requirements.description:
Go to Uniswap (https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?chain=polygon) and swap 50 $FUEL tokens for some $AIR tokens.
($AIR token contract: 0xf55cb3825335669b5d6ef0d4b16a8202b6c523c3)

requirements.name:
Go and mint your unique Launch Button NFT.
Enter your random launch code in the tokenID field.
requirements.description:
Go and mint your unique Launch Button NFT.
Enter your random launch code in the tokenID field.

requirements.name: You can explore your fresh minted NFT here: https://testnets.opensea.io/
requirements.description: You can explore your fresh minted NFT here: https://testnets.opensea.io/

name: Emergency Situation
summary: Outside the window, breathtaking views of the Web3 planets.
description: Outside the window, breathtaking views of the Web3 planets.

requirements.name: A fellow crew member needs some air ($AIR token). Please send 1 $AIR token to someone.
requirements.description: A fellow crew member needs some air ($AIR token). Please send 1 $AIR token to someone.

name: LFG
summary: Your rocket is off course. We need to fix it and correct the trajectory.
description: Your rocket is off course. We need to fix it and correct the trajectory.

requirements.name: Please burn one $FUEL token by sending it to the burn address (0x000000000000000000000000000000000000dead)
requirements.description: Please burn one $FUEL token by sending it to the burn address (0x000000000000000000000000000000000000dead)

name: What do we do?
summary: We're still off course - but there's hope.
description: We're still off course - but there's hope.

requirements.name: You’ve got just enough fuel to either get to one or another planet. Please vote to choose Planet for landing. You need at least 100 $FUEL tokens to vote.
requirements.description: You’ve got just enough fuel to either get to one or another planet. Please vote to choose Planet for landing. You need at least 100 $FUEL tokens to vote.

name: Landing
summary: The crew decides to continue the mission. When you land, you create a new token to be used for trade. Send your captains and crewmates one of your newly minted tokens through Metamask.
description: The crew decides to continue the mission. When you land, you create a new token to be used for trade. Send your captains and crewmates one of your newly minted tokens through Metamask.

requirements.name: Build your token via OpenZeppelin wizard and deploy ERC-20 smart contract via http://remix.ethereum.org/
